member.name: T:FlatStyle.Controls.ColorPicker
member.summary:
Holds a ColorPicker control, and exposes the ColorPicker SelectedColor.
Enhanced by Mark Treadwell (1/2/10) to include: - Added ability to set ColorPicker initial color via constructor or property - Use of Button's IsDefault and IsCancel properties - Setting tab behavior

member.name: M:FlatStyle.Controls.ColorPicker.#ctor(System.Windows.Media.Color)
member.param: Color to set the ColorPicker to.

member.name: T:FlatStyle.Controls.ColorPickerControl
member.summary:
A simple WPF color picker. The basic idea is to use a Color swatch image and then pick out a single pixel and use that pixel's RGB values along with the Alpha slider to form a SelectedColor.
This class is from Sacha Barber at http://sachabarber.net/?p=424 and http://www.codeproject.com/KB/WPF/WPFColorPicker.aspx.
This class borrows an idea or two from the following sources: - AlphaSlider and Preview box; Based on an article by ShawnVN's Blog; http://weblogs.asp.net/savanness/archive/2006/12/05/colorcomb-yet-another-color-picker-dialog-for-wpf.aspx. - 1*1 pixel copy; Based on an article by Lee Brimelow; http://thewpfblog.com/?p=62.
Enhanced by Mark Treadwell (1/2/10): - Left click to select the color with no mouse move - Set tab behavior - Set an initial color (note that the search to set the cursor ellipse delays the initial display) - Fix single digit hex displays - Add Mouse Wheel support to change the Alpha value - Modify color select dragging behavior

member.name: M:FlatStyle.Controls.ColorPickerControl.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor that initializes the ColorPicker to Black.

member.name: M:FlatStyle.Controls.ColorPickerControl.#ctor(System.Windows.Media.Color)
member.summary: Constructor that initializes to ColorPicker to the specified color.

member.name: P:FlatStyle.Controls.ColorPickerControl.SelectedColor
member.summary: Gets or privately sets the Selected Color.

member.name: M:FlatStyle.Controls.ColorPickerControl.AlphaSlider_ValueChanged(System.Object,System.Windows.RoutedPropertyChangedEventArgs{System.Double})
member.summary: Update SelectedColor Alpha based on Slider value.

member.name: M:FlatStyle.Controls.ColorPickerControl.CanvasImage_MouseMove(System.Object,System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Update the SelectedColor if moving the mouse with the left button down.

member.name: M:FlatStyle.Controls.ColorPickerControl.Swatch_MouseLeftButtonDown(System.Object,System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)
member.summary: Apply the new Swatch image based on user requested swatch.

member.name: M:FlatStyle.Controls.ColorPickerControl.CreateAlphaLinearBrush
member.summary: Creates a new LinearGradientBrush background for the Alpha area slider. This is based on the current color.

member.name: M:FlatStyle.Controls.ColorPickerControl.UpdateColor
member.summary: Sets a new Selected Color based on the color of the pixel under the mouse pointer.

member.name: M:FlatStyle.Controls.ColorPickerControl.UpdateCursorEllipse(System.Windows.Media.Color)
member.summary: Update the mouse cursor ellipse position.

member.name: M:FlatStyle.Controls.ColorPickerControl.UpdateTextBoxes
member.summary: Update text box values based on the Selected Color.
